PackageOracle.name: DA_PRODUCT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PRODUCT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.09.573670000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_nm IN VARCHAR2
,product_desc IN VARCHAR2
,product_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,supplier_party_id IN NUMBER
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,product_label IN VARCHAR2
,book_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,txt_to_speech IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_nm IN VARCHAR2
,product_desc IN VARCHAR2
,product_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,supplier_party_id IN NUMBER
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,product_label IN VARCHAR2
,book_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,txt_to_speech IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_nm IN VARCHAR2
,product_desc IN VARCHAR2
,product_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,supplier_party_id IN NUMBER
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,product_label IN VARCHAR2
,book_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,txt_to_speech IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_product;

body.name: DA_PRODUCT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PRODUCT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.09.586363000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_nm IN VARCHAR2
,product_desc IN VARCHAR2
,product_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,supplier_party_id IN NUMBER
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,product_label IN VARCHAR2
,book_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,txt_to_speech IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product.add(fx), parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || product_cd || '|' || product_nm || '|' || product_desc || '|' || product_type_cd || '|' || product_class_cd || '|' || supplier_party_id || '|' || billing_product_id || '|' || product_label || '|' || book_of_business || '|' || line_of_business || '|' || txt_to_speech || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_product a
(
a.product_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.product_cd
,a.product_nm
,a.product_desc
,a.product_type_cd
,a.product_class_cd
,a.supplier_party_id
,a.billing_product_id
,a.product_label
,a.book_of_business
,a.line_of_business
,a.txt_to_speech
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_product_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.product_cd
,add.product_nm
,add.product_desc
,add.product_type_cd
,add.product_class_cd
,add.supplier_party_id
,add.billing_product_id
,add.product_label
,add.book_of_business
,add.line_of_business
,add.txt_to_speech
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.product_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_nm IN VARCHAR2
,product_desc IN VARCHAR2
,product_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,supplier_party_id IN NUMBER
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,product_label IN VARCHAR2
,book_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,txt_to_speech IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product.add, parms=' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || product_cd || '|' || product_nm || '|' || product_desc || '|' || product_type_cd || '|' || product_class_cd || '|' || supplier_party_id || '|' || billing_product_id || '|' || product_label || '|' || book_of_business || '|' || line_of_business || '|' || txt_to_speech || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_product a
(
a.product_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.product_cd
,a.product_nm
,a.product_desc
,a.product_type_cd
,a.product_class_cd
,a.supplier_party_id
,a.billing_product_id
,a.product_label
,a.book_of_business
,a.line_of_business
,a.txt_to_speech
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_product_id.NEXTVAL
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.product_cd
,add.product_nm
,add.product_desc
,add.product_type_cd
,add.product_class_cd
,add.supplier_party_id
,add.billing_product_id
,add.product_label
,add.book_of_business
,add.line_of_business
,add.txt_to_speech
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_nm IN VARCHAR2
,product_desc IN VARCHAR2
,product_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,product_class_cd IN VARCHAR2
,supplier_party_id IN NUMBER
,billing_product_id IN NUMBER
,product_label IN VARCHAR2
,book_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,line_of_business IN VARCHAR2
,txt_to_speech IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product.add, parms=' || product_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || product_cd || '|' || product_nm || '|' || product_desc || '|' || product_type_cd || '|' || product_class_cd || '|' || supplier_party_id || '|' || billing_product_id || '|' || product_label || '|' || book_of_business || '|' || line_of_business || '|' || txt_to_speech || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_product a
(
a.product_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.product_cd
,a.product_nm
,a.product_desc
,a.product_type_cd
,a.product_class_cd
,a.supplier_party_id
,a.billing_product_id
,a.product_label
,a.book_of_business
,a.line_of_business
,a.txt_to_speech
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.product_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.product_cd
,add.product_nm
,add.product_desc
,add.product_type_cd
,add.product_class_cd
,add.supplier_party_id
,add.billing_product_id
,add.product_label
,add.book_of_business
,add.line_of_business
,add.txt_to_speech
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_product.del, parms=' || product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_product a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.product_id = del.product_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_product.del');

END del;

END da_product;
